radiographic_examinations.findings: Large pulmonary lesion (15.6 mm) in the left hilus, atelectasis of the left upper lobe, multiple smaller nodules in the left lung suspect for metastatic lesions.
Avid F-18 FDG-uptake in the pulmonary lesions (max SUV 26.85), large abdominal mass (5 x 10 cm, SUV 24.91), and multiple smaller mesenteric nodules with significant metabolic activity.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: On follow-up PET/CT scan 2 months after presentation, all lesions showed regression, only the large abdominal lesion took up F-18 FDG but with a much lower intensity (SUV 3.57).
